cnuphys.tinyMS.common
Class Environment

java.lang.Object
  cnuphys.tinyMS.common.Environment

public final class Environment
extends java.lang.Object

This utility class holds environmental information such as the home directory, current working directory, host name, etc.

Author:
heddle
